entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
